The Supreme Court issued only one decision this morning : a 6-3 reversal of a 9th Circuit ruling in the copyright fight between film company MGM and Paula Petrella , daughter of Raging Bull author Frank Petrella .
The decision , in Petrella 's favor , weighs the idea of laches , which generally protects against lawsuits filed after a long period of time has elapsed .
